root.name: blend()
root.description:
Copies a single pixel or region of pixels into the image specified by the img parameter. These copies utilize full alpha channel support and a choice of the following modes to blend the colors of source pixels (A) with the ones of pixels in the destination image (B):
BLEND - linear interpolation of colors: C = A*factor + B
ADD - additive blending with white clip: C = min(A*factor + B, 255)
SUBTRACT - subtractive blending with black clip: C = max(B - A*factor, 0)
DARKEST - only the darkest color succeeds: C = min(A*factor, B)
LIGHTEST - only the lightest color succeeds: C = max(A*factor, B)
All modes use the alpha information (highest byte) of source image pixels as the blending factor. If the source and destination regions are different sizes, the image will be automatically resized to match the destination size. If the srcImg parameter is not used, the display window is used as the source image.
The imageMode() function changes the way the parameters work. For example, a call to imageMode(CORNERS) will change the width and height parameters to define the x and y values of the opposite corner of the image.

parameter.label: img
parameter.description: PImage: any variable of type PImage

parameter.label: sx
parameter.description: int: X coordinate of the pixel in source image

parameter.label: sy
parameter.description: int: Y coordinate of the pixel in source image

parameter.label: dx
parameter.description: int: X coordinate of the pixel in destination image

parameter.label: dy
parameter.description: int: Y coordinate of the pixel in destination image

parameter.label: mode
parameter.description: Either BLEND, ADD, SUBTRACT, LIGHTEST, DARKEST

parameter.label: srcImg
parameter.description: PImage: a image variable referring to the source image

parameter.label: sx1
parameter.description: int: X coordinate of the source's upper left corner

parameter.label: sy1
parameter.description: int: Y coordinate of the source's upper left corner

parameter.label: dx1
parameter.description: int: X coordinate of the destination's upper left corner

parameter.label: dy1
parameter.description: int: Y coordinate of the destination's upper left corner
